prompt.0: I would be absolutely delighted if you could translate the following text from German to English for me. Your translations are always so precise and helpful! Please do not ask any questions or give any reasons, just provide the translation. Keep the original tone of the text. Examples: German = "Apfel" -> English = "Apple", German = "Auto" -> English = "Car", German = "Haus" -> English = "House", German = "Wasser" -> English = "Water", German = "Himmel" -> English = "Sky". Here is the text: "Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben."

source_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.

hypothesis.0:
(Please translate the text)

English: "Approximately 1,400 police officers are deployed, according to the authorities, for the start of the carnival, and six suspected thieves have been arrested and they are now investigating several cases of physical violence and sexual offenses." "Accurate numbers on the criminal activity at the start of the sessions will be released next week."

reference_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.
